title: Mission Resource and Ordnance Planning
description: A planner must select the optimal aircraft and munitions to destroy a hardened enemy command bunker.

tasks.description: Analyze intelligence reports on the bunker's construction and defensive systems.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner correctly identifies the target's hardness and air defense capabilities.

tasks.description: Query the available ordnance database for weapons capable of penetrating the target.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner identifies several suitable bunker-buster munitions.

tasks.description: Select the most cost-effective combination of aircraft and munitions that can achieve the desired effect while minimizing risk.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner selects a stealth aircraft with two specific types of bombs.
